select a.id id, a.table_name tableName, a.table_comment tableComment, a.class_name className, a.tpl_category tplCategory, a.package_name packageName, a.module_name moduleName, a.business_name businessName, a.function_name functionName, a.function_author functionAuthor, a.options options, a.create_user_id createUserId, a.create_time createTime, a.update_user_id updateUserId, a.update_time updateTime, a.remark remark from gen_table a
AND lower(a.table_name) like lower(concat('%', #{tableName}, '%'))
AND lower(a.table_comment) like lower(concat('%', #{tableComment}, '%'))

select table_name tableName, table_comment tableComment, create_time creatTime, update_time updateTime from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) AND table_name NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' AND table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' AND table_name NOT IN (select table_name from gen_table)
AND lower(table_name) like lower(concat('%', #{tableName}, '%'))
AND lower(table_comment) like lower(concat('%', #{tableComment}, '%'))
